body:
5 is somewhat because of that.  Doing this has been a useful exercise in following the convoluted code -- escassign calls itself recursively to break down/translate some flow/alias concepts into simpler ones, and in the process things are made to look non-intuitive, so I had to replumb the whole thing (i.e., if a reason is passed in from outside, respect it).  I'm still not getting the name of the external variable and I'm not entirely sure why.

Austin suggest I prefix the line numbers in the sentence with "line", so that happened.
